#summary How to get support for jquery.cookies.js
#labels Featured,Phase-Support

= What to do if you're having problems =
  # Please read the [http://code.google.com/p/cookies/wiki/Documentation documentation] on this project.
  # Search the [http://code.google.com/p/cookies/issues/list issues] to see if problems have been reported and/or resolved.
  # Open an issue to ask for help, report a bug, or request enhancements. Providing patches for bugs and enhancements is appreciated.
